00079     public function setOptions(array $options)
00080     {
00081         foreach ($options as $key => $value) {
00082             if (in_array(strtolower($key), $this->_skipOptions)) {
00083                 continue;
00084             }
00085 
00086             $method = 'set' . ucfirst($key);
00087             if (method_exists($this, $method)) {
00088                 $this->$method($value);
00089             }
00090         }
00091 
00092         return $this;
00093     }
